release.action: Fix several issues around Java OS and header files location detection.
Correct several log messages where an incorrect placeholder led to truncation of the inserted values.
Add protection to avoid high CPU usage for applications running in JVM mode that do not wait for the stop method to be called before the start method returns.
Bump org.apache.commons:commons-parent from 71 to 78 #189, #196, #198, #204, #207, #210, #216.
Remove autogenerated files and rely on autoreconf only.
[StepSecurity] ci: Harden GitHub Actions #95.
Procrun. Enable Control Flow Guard for Windows binaries.
Procrun. Better label for command used to start service shown in Prunmgr.exe.
jsvc. Fix warnings when running support/buildconf.sh
jsvc. Fix compilation issue with newer compilers.
Procrun. Refactor UAC support so that elevation is only requested for actions that require administrator privileges.
Procrun. Add support for hybrid CRT builds.
jsvc. Add support for LoongArch64 support #92.
Bump commons-parent from 57 to 69 #155.
The minimum support Java version has been upgraded from Java 7 to Java 8.
Procrun. The minimum Windows versions supported are now Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016.
Bump commons-parent from 69 to 70.
Procrun. Configured stack size now applies to the main thread when running in JVM mode.
Procrun. If the specified log directory does not exist, attempt to create any missing parent directories, as well as the specified directory, when the service starts.
Procrun. Allow Windows service dependencies to be managed by Procrun or by 'sc config ...'.
jsvc. Fix DaemonController.reload() only working the first time it is called.
jsvc. Remove incorrent definition 'supported_os' which defined in psupport.m4 file to fix jsvc build error on riscv64.
Bump commons-parent from 54 to 57 #71, #91.
Procrun. Fix creation of duplicate ACL entries on some Windows platforms.
Procrun. Follow-up to ensure all child processes are cleaned up if the service does not stop cleanly. #64
Bump actions/cache from 3.0.8 to 3.0.11 #60.
Bump actions/checkout from 3.0.2 to 3.1.0 #59.
Bump actions/setup-java from 3.5.1 to 3.6.0 #63.
Bump spotbugs-maven-plugin from 4.7.2.0 to 4.7.3.0 #61, #66.
Bump commons-parent from 55 to 56 #76
Procrun. Remove noisy INFO log message that triggered logging once per minute while the service was running.
Fix typos in Javadoc and comments #50, #51.
Procrun. The DependsOn parameter is no longer ignored when updating the service configuration.
Procrun. Fix crash and provide an error level log message when the user attempts to start the service without configuring a JVM and none is available via the registry.
Bump actions/cache from 3.0.3 to 3.0.8.
Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 3.0.2.
Bump commons-parent from 53 to 54 #55.
Bump spotbugs-maven-plugin from 4.6.0.0 to 4.7.2.0 #48, #52, #53.
Bump jacoco-maven-plugin from 0.8.7 to 0.8.8.
Bump japicmp-maven-plugin from 0.15.4 to 0.16.0.
Bump JUnit 4 to 5 vintage.
Procrun. Take account of LogLevel setting when logging to standard error so the user can opt to see messages at Info level and below.
Procrun. Clear expected errors when checking for environment variables to prevent the expected errors from polluting subsequent log messages.
Procrun. Only configure the logging to be written to a file when running as a service.
Procrun. Clear logged error on service installation failure to prevent the error polluting subsequent log messages.
Procrun. When configuring permissions for the logging path, use the default path if no explicit logging path is specified.
Procrun. When logging issues configuring permissions for the logging path, explicitly state when default values are being used rather than logging blank values.
Procrun. Increase the size limit on the message component of log entries to 4096 characters.
Procrun. Ensure child processes are cleaned up if the service does not stop cleanly. #39
Refactor multiple if statements to use switch. #45
Bump actions/cache from 2.1.7 to 3.0.3 #41.
Bump actions/setup-java from 2 to 3.5.1 #43.
Bump spotbugs-maven-plugin from 4.5.3.0 to 4.6.0.0 #42.
Bump commons-parent from 52 to 53 #44.
Procrun. --StopTimeout can be used to define the time that procrun waits for service to exit, but INFINITE timeout was using instead.
Minor improvements to Java code #22, #31.
Procrun. Minor improvement that allows to have WINVER nmake variable directly defined at compile time as ABI version in hexadecimal format.

Procrun. Log at Trace instead of Debug when a service reports its state from the prunsrv app. This avoids the Debug log filling up as it adds two events per minute. You can then stay in Debug logging to capture register, start, stop, and unregister Debug events.
Procrun. Miscellaneous logging improvements.
Procrun. Log the prunsrv function names at the Trace level.
Procrun. Only redirect stderr and stdout to files for the running service. Output from commands executed on the command line will not be redirected.
Procrun. Ensure that the user configured to run the service is also granted access to the log file directory.
Procrun. Ensure Trace is included in the logging levels exposed in the GUI.
Procrun. Support --Startup=delayed for service installation as well as service update.
Enable Dependabot #20.
Procrun. reportServiceStatusE() shows scale of dwWaitHint as millisecond in logging.
Procrun. reportServiceStatusE() shows a short description for dwCurrentState in logging.
Procrun. Add support for a new log level called Trace, lower-level than Debug.
Procrun. Add logging when failing to obtain a service's description from the registry.
Procrun. Add logging when failing to set the options of a service.
Bump actions/cache from v2 to v2.1.7 #24, #30, #36.
Bump build actions/setup-java from v1.4.3 to v2.
Bump commons.jacoco.version from 0.8.5 to 0.8.7.
Bump commons.japicmp.version from 0.14.3 to 0.15.4.
Bump junit from 4.13.1 to 4.13.2 #25.
Bump commons.daemon.javaversion 1.6 -> 1.7.
Bump spotbugs-maven-plugin from 4.4.2.2 to 4.5.2.0 #37.
Update the release build instructions to use CMSC 15.0.44.
Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 3 #40.
Procrun. Ensure that log messages written to stdout and stderr are not lost during start-up.
Procrun. Correct a regression introduced in 1.2.3. Enable the service to start if the Options value is not present in the registry.
jsvc. Don't fail if the CAP_DAC_READ_SEARCH capability is not available. Fall back to using argv[0] rather than /proc/self/exe to determine the path for the current binary.
Procrun. Remove some unnecessary code.

Procrun. Correct multiple issues related to enabling a service to interact with the desktop. Provide a better error message if this option is used with an invalid user, install the service with the option enabled if requested and correctly save the setting if it is enabled in the GUI.
jsvc. Update the list of paths searched for libjvm.so to include the path used by OpenJDK 11.
Procrun. Add additional debug logging for Java start mode.
jsvc. Remove incorrect definition 'supported_os' which defined in psupport.m4 file to fix jsvc build error on s390, arm, aarch64, mipsel and mips.
Procrun. More debug logging in prunsrv.c and javajni.c.
jsvc. Update arguments.c to support Java 11 --enable-preview #18.
jsvc and Procrun. Add support for Java native memory tracking.
Procrun. Add a new command, print, that outputs the command to (re-)configure the service with the current settings. This is intended to be used to save settings such as before an upgrade.
Procrun. Correct a regression in the fix for DAEMON-401 that prevented the service from starting unless support for the universal C runtime had been installed.
Update Commons-Parent to version 49.
Procrun. Fix compiler warnings for unreferenced formal parameters.
Procrun. Switch code to use more secure versions of Windows API calls to resolve warnings reported by newer versions of Visual Studio.

Correct the source assembly definitions to add README.md, CONTRIBUTING.md and HOWTO-RELEASE.txt, remove references to the deleted Ant build files and exclude the working directories of Windows binary builds.
More startup on Windows logging in javajni.c. #14.
jsvc. Correct debug log message that reports change in umask.
Procrun. Correct a regression in the previous fix for this issue that caused 32-bit services to crash on start-up.
Procrun. Correct a regression in the fix for DAEMON-391 that caused the GUI to mix up the WARN and INFO logging levels.
Procrun. Expand the search for a valid Java runtime library to include the current JDK home defined in the Windows registry. Fully document the search algorithm used to find the Java runtime library.
Procrun. Add to OPT_LFLAGS rather than overwrite OPT_LFLAGS when setting /OPT:REF in the make file for Windows.
Procrun. Only set the global shutdown event if the event is created.
Unable to build with Java 9 using ant; dropped Ant build files.
Procrun. prunsrv stopping with error due to hard-coded timeout.
Update config.guess and config.sub.
Jsvc. Set the sun.java.command system property when starting via jsvc so that tools like jconsole show something meaningful for the process name.
Procrun. Correct the level name used in the GUI for WARN so that changes made via the GUI are recognised. Order the log levels in the drop-down from ERROR to DEBUG.
Procrun. Correct reversed code comments for JRE and JDK locations in the registry.
Procrun. Undefined behavior in registry.c dwRegKey = dwRegKey++
Procrun. Fix a bug that meant a value provided for LibraryPath replaced the value of the PATH environment variable rather than prepended to it.
Procrun. Ensure that JAVA_HOME/bin is on the path when running in jvm mode so that additional DLLs, such as awt.dll, can be found if required.
Procrun. Ensure that the java.library.path environment variable is correctly configured when running on a JRE that depends on the Universal CRT.
Procrun. Log the error code returned if JVM creation fails to aid debugging.
Harden the Windows binaries against DLL hijacking in the directory where the binaries are located.
Procrun. Ensure that environment variables set via prunsrv are visible to native libraries that depend on the Universal CRT.
Procrun. Add 'NT Authority\LocalService' and 'NT Authority\NetworkService' as options to the Log On user interface.
Procrun. Change the default service user from LocalSystem to 'NT Authority\LocalService'.
Procrun. Avoid a crash on shutdown if multiple WM_CLOSE messages are received.
Procrun. Ignore blank lines inserted into the Java Options and/or Java 9 Options text areas. This prevents settings after the first blank line from being lost when saved to the registry.
Procrun. Remove the code that removed quotes from configured Java and Java 9 Options.
Procrun. Ensure that vfprintf is the first parameter passed when using JNI to create the JVM as a workaround for startup error messages not being visible on stdout or stderr.
Procrun. Add an option to configure the service to use the 'Automatic (Delayed Start)' startup mode.
Procrun. When running in jre mode, if the standard Java registry entries for JavaHome and RuntimeLib are not present, attempt to use the Procrun JavaHome key to find the runtime library.
jsvc. Include the full path to the jsvc executable in the debug log.
jsvc. Improve search for libjli.dylib on macOS when using custom-built OpenJDK binaries.
Procrun. Improve log messages for interactions with the Windows service.
jsvc. Improve mips detection.
Add DEBUG and ERROR logging to help diagnose problems when starting a Windows Service.
Update the minimum Java requirement from version 5 to 6.
Increase minimum Java version to Java 5.
Add AArch64 support to src/native/unix/support/apsupport.m4
Compile the Windows binaries with the /DYNAMICBASE and /NXCOMPAT switches.
Remove calls to explicit garbage collection during daemon start and stop.
Update config.guess and config.sub to add support, amongst others, for the 64-bit PowerPC Little-Endian architecture.
Ensure that the PID file on Windows, if used, is readable by other processes.
Update Commons-Parent to version 41.
Update apsupport.m4 add support for 64-bit PowerPC architectures.
Suppress spurious "The data area passed to a system call is too small" error message in the log when Procrun fails to stop the service.
Move attributions from @author in Javadocs to POM.
Enable jsvc to start when running on Java 9.
Fix a resource leak opening the JVM configuration file.
Improve the jsvc code that restarts the process if the JVM crashes so that if the JVM crashes after a signal has been received to shut down jsvc does not attempt to restart the JVM.
Ensure that the child process is started with the correct umask.
Correct conflicting information for the behavior of Procrun when using jvm mode.
Ensure that, when using Procrun in java or exe mode, the service process waits for the stop process to complete before starting clean-up to avoid a crash in the stop process.
Enable jsvc to find the jvm when running on AIX.
Ensure that Procrun treats JVM crashes as service failures so the recovery options will apply.
Ensure that the //MQ command closes the prunmgr process even if the configuration dialog is open when the //MQ command is used.

When looking in the Windows registry for JRE and JDK installation locations, additionally check the registry keys used by IBM provided JREs and JDKs. Do this after checking the keys used by Oracle provided JREs and JDKs.

When looking in the Windows registry for JRE and JDK installation locations, additionally check the registry keys used by Oracle provided Java 9 and later JREs and JDKs. Do this after checking the keys used by Oracle provided Java 8 and earlier JREs and JDKs.
Add support for Java 9 command line arguments to jsvc.
Add a restarts options to jsvc to control the number of permitted restarts after a system crash.
Remove support for building Procrun for the Itanium platform.
Make Windows XP the minimum support target platform.
Add support to Procrun for separate JVM options for use when running on Java 9 and above.
Fix race conditions in PID file handling in jsvc.
